General.Name: TotalEnergies EP Gabon S.A.
General.Description: TotalEnergies EP Gabon Société Anonyme engages in the mining, exploration, and production of crude oil in Gabon. It also holds interests in operated and non-operated production fields. The company was formerly known as Total Gabon. The company was incorporated in 1949 and is headquartered in Port Gentil, Gabon. TotalEnergies EP Gabon Société Anonyme is a subsidiary of TotalEnergies SE.
